comment._content: Here is article from NYTimes (10/7/1912) about Fleet's visit to New York, including Adm Osterhaus: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9C04E...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Hugo Osterhaus (born 15 June 1851, Belleville, Illinois - died 11 June 1927, Castle Point, New York) was a Rear Admiral in the United States Navy. He was the son of Civil War Major General Peter J. Osterhaus (1823–1917) and father of Navy Admiral Hugo Wilson Osterhaus (1878–1972), and is buried on Arlington National Cemetery. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_Osterhaus

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Thanks for the additional information on Osterhaus.  We'll include it next time we update.
